alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 3:19PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts on the benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected Tuesday night through Wednesday morning, impacting the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
